column4: I'm using kubuntu and just logged into myspace with konqueror just fine :|
Ok what are your settings to do it?
As i for the life of me couldnt
nothing special, just set up flash player now in it... but i don't know if it will work
is your system completely up to date?
yip might be cause I used the repo from kubuntuguide
one thing though, if I have "enable plugins on demand only" enabled (which is default), flash player won't play on youtube
when I unmark that box, it starts playing flash
I can play youtube no problem
Your a gensuis<sp> it has worked
delete cookies and cache and away it went
weird, I have that one enabled, plugin issue then?
well, glad it's working for you now :)
yip hey have you got FF installed?
ya but I used it because flash wouldn't play, but just now figured it out so I might try konq for a stretch ^^
